name: Flourishing Happiness | THSB
description: Flourishing Happiness (FH) envisioned a perpetual ripple effect through propagation and advocacy; we are a vehicle to a ride and a support platform for your aspirations. In particular, for people with mental health conditions and substance dependency issues. We design a specially curated, safe platform for the individual with telltale stories. A story that is so profound that it became an enabler that empowers and inspires you to tell your story to move the world. In the process, it assists others in getting out of their shells and creating a flourishing wheel. The one question we need to ask is, how can I destigmatise it all; it hurts as it affects my social life. Hence, the birth of THSB propagates the innate desire to be free and to stand up with dignity.

Highlights.name: Think Tank and School for Happiness Education
Highlights.description: The Flourishing Happiness Centre positions itself as both a think tank and a school [1]. This means they combine research and development of positive psychology concepts with practical education for individuals and organizations. They likely conduct research on happiness and well-being, and then translate those findings into educational programs.

Highlights.name: Building Skills for Positive Psychology and Well-being
Highlights.description: The Centre offers courses, certifications, and programs focused on positive psychology [1]. Positive psychology is the scientific study of human flourishing and optimal functioning. By offering programs in this field, the Centre equips individuals with tools and strategies to enhance their own happiness and well-being.

Highlights.name: Focus on Resilience and Work-Life Balance
Highlights.description: Some of the specific programs offered by the Centre include "Resilience at work," "Positive Communication," and "Stress Management through Art and Mindfulness" [1]. This suggests a focus on building resilience and improving work-life balance, both of which are important aspects of overall well-being.

enhanced_description: Flourishing Happiness (FH) is a support platform and vehicle designed to foster a perpetual ripple effect through propagation and advocacy, particularly for individuals with mental health conditions and substance dependency issues. It offers a specially curated, safe platform for individuals to share their profound stories, which aims to empower and inspire others, assist them in overcoming personal barriers, and create a 'flourishing wheel' of well-being. The core objective is to destigmatize mental health challenges and promote dignity and freedom. FH operates as both a 'Think Tank and School for Happiness Education,' combining research in positive psychology and well-being with practical educational programs. These programs include courses and certifications focused on building skills in positive psychology, with specific offerings like 'Resilience at work,' 'Positive Communication,' and 'Stress Management through Art and Mindfulness,' all designed to enhance individual happiness, build resilience, and improve work-life balance. The ultimate goal is to improve employee happiness and engagement within organizations.
